bug.author: tamuhey
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
IndexError
text = "A'B C" words = ["A", "'", "B", "C"] doc = tokenizer(text) GoldParse(doc, words=words) <denchmark-code>--------------------------------------------------------------------------- IndexError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-7-45b5f2ec7502> in <module> 2 words = ["A", "'", "B", "C"] 3 doc = tokenizer(text) ----> 4 GoldParse(doc, words=words)
gold.pyx in spacy.gold.GoldParse.__init__()
IndexError: list index out of range </denchmark-code>
TypeError
text = "A-B" words = ["A-B"] doc = tokenizer(text) GoldParse(doc, words=words) <denchmark-code>--------------------------------------------------------------------------- TypeError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-8-9ae6959d65fe> in <module> 2 words = ["A-B"] 3 doc = tokenizer(text) ----> 4 GoldParse(doc, words=words)
gold.pyx in spacy.gold.GoldParse.__init__()
TypeError: list indices must be integers or slices, not NoneType </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: mac OSX Python Version Used: 3.7 spaCy Version Used: master
